track.name: Please Love Me
comments: What a tone! Only Mr. B. B. KiiiiiiiiiiiiiIIIIIIIIIIIIIIiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiing!

The legend lives!!! Rock on BB!!!
The blues is the foundation, and it's got to carry the top. The other part of the scene, the rock 'n' roll and the jazz, are the walls of the blues.

If blues suit you this is one of the greatest
Love BB! He is the Man! Whooooo!
It`s irritating that`s not the songs I like that you are playing. I don`t like that at all. For example BB King has houndreds of better songs to play than this. I don`t want it like this.
Das geht ins Blut! Dabei spüre ich förmlich den Blues!!!
